sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Australia is to buy as many as five nuclear-powered submarines, then build a new model with US and British technology.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It's an ambitious plan to bulk up western muscle across the Asia-Pacific in the face of a rising China.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It's all part of the recently formed alliance between the UK, the US and Australia, known as AUKUS.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Their leaders met in San Diego to unveil their plans.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: At the subsequent press conference, President Biden was keen to make one point clear.

sentences.sentence: Nuclear power, not nuclear arms.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: For the first time ever, it will be three fleets of submarines working together across both the Atlantic and Pacific, keeping our oceans free, open and prosperous for decades to come.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The scale, complexity and economic significance of this investment is akin to the creation of the Australian automotive industry in the post-World War II period.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Under the deal, Australian Navy personnel will be embedded at US and UK submarine bases to gain the necessary skills to use the submarines.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: From 2027, the US and UK will base a small number of nuclear subs at a base in Perth, Western Australia, before Canberra buys the first three American Virginia-class submarines in the early 2030s.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: U.S. President Joe Biden has approved a controversial oil and gas drilling project in Alaska, despite widespread opposition because of its likely environmental and climate impacts.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It's known as the Willow Oil Project.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The drilling area lies within the Arctic Circle.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Activists have dubbed it a carbon bomb.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Supporters of the Willow project say it will create local investment and thousands of jobs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Biden has imposed limits on oil and gas drilling in 16 million acres of Alaska in the compromise move.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: The man who revolutionized the high jump in athletics has died after a short illness. Dick Fosbury was the first to leap backwards over the bar using a technique which became

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: known as the Fosbury Flop.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: It was at the Mexico Olympics in 1968 that the American took everyone by surprise.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: He cleared 2.24 meters on his third attempt to win the gold medal. What started as his own idea at school went on to change the sport forever with the Fosbury flop becoming accepted worldwide.
